synopsis.text: Miss Monochrome is an android idol living in a luxurious castle with her robot vacuum companion Ruu-chan. She dreams of becoming a popular idol like Kikuko and being back in the spotlight, but struggles to make her debut. Miss Monochrome tries various unorthodox methods to achieve fame - recruiting a manager from a convenience store, taking bit parts on TV shows, and performing bizarre feats to get media attention. Through her dedication and uniqueness, she begins gaining publicity, though the road to stardom remains filled with challenges. Whether facing difficulties with untrustworthy managers or being tossed around by others in the show business world, Miss Monochrome persists in pursuing her goal of becoming a top idol.
